TestCaseMetaData.name: ORL Commit Accept
TestCaseMetaData.Description: The EHR-S transmits an accept acknowledgement message to Century Hospital's LIS which indicates the Application Acknowledgement message has been successfully received..
TestCaseMetaData.PreCondition: The ORL message has been received by the EHR-S
TestCaseMetaData.TestObjectives: Minimally populated message. Demonstrate capability to support creating a positive accept acknowledgment Message in response to successful receipt of the ORL message: Minimally populated MSH Segment - Demonstrate the capability to support the minimally required data elements in the MSH segment. Minimally populated MSA Segment - Demonstrate the capability to support the minimally required data elements in the MSA segment.
TestCaseMetaData.Comments: This is the initial "smoke testing" to reveal simple failures of the acknowledgment message severe enough to preclude further testing.
